parts.text: This is it! Finally!
parts.speaker: kai

parts.text: Why do I feel like I'm the only one excited!?
parts.speaker: kai

parts.text: Well Kai, that's because you are. -smirks-
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: Oh c'mon Klaus, you are too!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Look at your hands, they're shaking!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Knowing Klaus.. He was up all night triple checking his school supplies...
parts.speaker: jute

parts.text: Not funny Jute! Being prepared is.. Very important!
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: I hope I get earth. I'm not sure if I could take care of any other kind of familiar.
parts.speaker: orubo

parts.text: Orubo, I think any familiar that ends up with you will be very lucky. -smiles-
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Unless it's something other than earth.. .. ..
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: Quite the comedian Klaus.. At least Orubo knows what he wants...
parts.speaker: jute

parts.text: Fire! I want fire!
parts.speaker: kai

parts.text: Our school counselor said I'm pretty much guaranteed to get fire!
parts.speaker: kai

parts.text: I'm sure you will Kai! You certainly have a fiery spirit!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Not funny Jute! Being prepared is.. Very important!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Not really sure what my spirit would be considered.
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: But I'll be happy no matter what I get!
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: Step 1, get a Familiar.
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: Step 2, become the Legendary Klaus, Libra of Statae Academy! Muahaha!
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: It's our first year Klaus.. I think you skipped some steps..
parts.speaker: jute

parts.text: Settle down and listen to me, everyone.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Let me start by saying welcome to Statae Academy
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: I am Ms.Cross, head of the Academys “Mystic Fauna and Familiars” Department.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Here at Statae Academy, we make it a point to use our time wisely.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Every minute we waste in here, is another minute that a Disturbance can take the lives of innocent civilians.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: By joining Statae Academy, each and every one of you has decided to become a Libra.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: To risk your lives in order to maintain balance in our world.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Your training here at Statae Academy will be gruelling, and thorough.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Any of you who don’t feel capable of meeting our expectations are free to leave at any time.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Questions?
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Err...
parts.speaker: orubo

parts.text: No?
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Good.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Then let's get right to work. I will have every student come down to the front 1 at a time..
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Your job is to focus on the Mana Shard within the summoning circle, as hard as you can.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: After I recite the incantation, your Familiar will be summoned..
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: As you all should know, your Familiar is chosen by you.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Or more specifically, your spirit.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: You will get one of the 6 elements.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Earth, Water, Air, Fire, Darkness, or Light.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: After you receive your familiar, I ask that you sit down immediately.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Now, lets begin.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: FIREEEE!!! I knew it!
parts.speaker: kai

parts.text: I’m gonna name you Sal!
parts.speaker: kai

parts.text: Sal the Salamander... I would have never thought of that...
parts.speaker: jute

parts.text: I got Wind... I’m not sure what this thing even is...
parts.speaker: jute

parts.text: Jute, that would be a butterfly.. You got Air!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Orubo got a tortoise, so Earth!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Kai got a salamander, which certainly represents Fire.
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: I got a Fairy, which is Light!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: And Klaus...
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Dark.. Of all the elements, I got Dark?
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: More specifically, a depth dweller.
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: You do know the whole, light and dark, good and evil thing isn’t real Klaus.
parts.speaker: kai

parts.text: I know, but... Regardless- Dark it is!
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: Unless it's something other than earth.. .. ..
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: Remember what Ms.Cross said!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: She can’t even recall the last time a Dark Familiar was summoned!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: That makes you pretty special!
parts.speaker: lythe

parts.text: Right. I’m gonna go do my first attunement.
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: I’ll see you guys later.
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: Oh hi Klaus. Not sure what to do, I see?
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: It's time for your first attunement. As we don't waste time, you can use the job board on my right side.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Open it and choose your mission by clicking an elevated area.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: It's been a while since a new recruit visited the caves. Stay safe, Klaus.
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Thank you.
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: I feel so powerful suddenly. What did Mrs. Kaoru say again?
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: 'Remenber, during a new sensation it's rewarding to press the X key!'
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: So cryptic... What could she have meant?
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: Mrs. Kaoru, I thought this first assignment would be safe? These enemies disobey the laws of physics and good game design!
parts.speaker: klaus

parts.text: Oh Klaus. Thank you for playing the game! We ran into issues with the enemies at the finish line, but hope you enjoyed the game!
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: Reaching this point should be a lot easier in the post-jam version. So if you're interested, sign up for that!
parts.speaker: mscross

parts.text: You've effectively reached the end of this level, though if you didn't go left after falling down, you may have missed out on a secret...
parts.speaker: mscross
